content: I'll definitely check out their gift wrapping services and options. Since I've been opting for eco-friendly gift wrapping lately, it's good to know that these stores share the same values. By the way, I've been meaning to ask, do you have any tips on how to keep track of gift expenses? I've been using a spreadsheet to keep track of my spending, but I was wondering if there are any other methods or apps that you'd recommend.
